abstract: Lawyers for parents of teenager Ye Mengyuan have dropped their lawsuit against city of San Francisco; 16-year-old was killed after being run over by emergency vehicles responding to crash landing of Asiana Airlines Flight 216 at San Francisco airport in 2013.
lead_paragraph: A teenage girl was run over and killed by emergency vehicles after an Asiana Airlines crash landing at the San Francisco airport

headline.main: Suit Dropped Over Death in Plane Rescue
headline.print_headline: Parents of Girl Run Over During Plane Rescue Drop Lawsuit Against San Francisco

snippet: A teenage girl was run over and killed by emergency vehicles after an Asiana Airlines crash landing at the San Francisco airport
